summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning amending various Sections of the Land Use Code to change the requirements for the development of multifamily structures; repealing Sections 23.34.013 through 23.34.022 and Sections 23.45.006.5 through 23.45.076 and adding a new Section 23.34.014 and new Sections 23.45.008 through 23.45.018 to consolidate development standards for building in all multifamily zones.
